name: subteam_created
desc: A User Group has been added to the team.
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A User Group has been added to the team  				Compatibility:									RTM 													Events API 							  					Scopes:					usergroups:read 				 The subteam_created event is sent to all connections for a team when a new User Group is created. Clients can use this to update their local list of User Groups and group members.

subteam.name: Marketing Team
subteam.description: Marketing gurus, PR experts and product advocates.
